### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL,
    currency VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR,
    user_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name VARCHAR,
    is_active BOOLEAN,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR UNIQUE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
